jobDescription: Are you looking to work for a stable company with an established IT department in north Orange County? If so, please read on! This company has been in business for nearly 15 years in the financial space and continue to grow. They are a huge proponent of work life balance, competitive pay and a great team! Currently, they are looking for a Data Analyst to add to their growing team who has a firm grasp of SQL, BI and reporting! Desired Skills 4+ years experience as a Data Analyst (Datawarehouse Engineers will also be considered!)  Experience with dashboards, reporting and BI Tools (including Qlik, and Tableau)  Experience with SQL Server (ideally SSIS, T-SQL, and Stored Procedures)  Great communication. Both written and verbal Pluses: Mortgage or financial experience would be a huge plus!  Experience with tools: BPI and FRD  Understanding of Data warehousing  ETL experience Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision  PTO and Potential Bonus
